LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableModDesc: When enabled, colonists will automatically equip better weapons based on their outfit policy. When disabled, all automatic weapon management is turned off.
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableDebugLoggingDesc: Outputs detailed information to the debug log for troubleshooting. This will create many log entries and may impact performance. Only enable when reporting issues.
LanguageData.AutoArm_ShowNotificationsDesc: Shows blue notification messages when colonists equip or drop weapons. Disabling this will make weapon changes silent but they will still happen.
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableSidearmAutoEquipDesc: Allows colonists to automatically pick up additional weapons as sidearms. Simple Sidearms must be installed and configured. This may impact performance with many colonists.
LanguageData.AutoArm_CheckCEAmmoDesc: When enabled, colonists will only pick up weapons if they have access to appropriate ammunition. Disabling this may result in colonists carrying weapons they cannot use. Only affects Combat Extended games.
LanguageData.AutoArm_NoCompatModsDetected: None - using base game features only
LanguageData.AutoArm_SettingsReset: Settings have been reset to defaults
